about_the_game:
The Gold River Project™ throws you and your friends into an epic, wilderness adventure! Try to escape a grueling experiment across one of the largest private nature reserves in the Pacific Northwest. You are being watched, studied and manipulated at every turn. Scavenge resources, solve the mysteries within and try to survive another day.

CAMP SOLO OR WITH FRIENDS

Welcome to Gold River! A remote camping adventure you can do alone or with friends. A chartered float plane will drop you off by beautiful lakes where you can kayak, hike the gorgeous trails, make camp and fall asleep counting the stars.

TRIP BECOMES A TRAP

One week turns into several as you suspect your guide is never coming back. Deserted, you discover you are trapped and now an unwilling lab rat. Can you survive an ever changing, artificial environment and it's inhabitants?

WE ARE MOTHER NATURE

Find a way through increasingly harsh environments, adapt to their unique challenges, and out smart your captors to survival and find a way out.

FEATURES

  • Multiplayer: Survive by yourself or with friends in online co-op!

  • Crafting: Build survival equipment, weapons, farm plots and more to help you stay alive!

  • Research: Learn new things to craft from items you find or from trade.

  • Build: Expand your campsite to prepare for what's to come.

  • Scavenge: All items are all useful, it's up t﻿o you to figure it out how.

  • Puzzles, Stealth or Discovery: There is more than one way out.

  • Progress: Play at your own pace. No time restrictions.

  • Replayability: Substations, supplies and points of interest  - these locations change with each new play through.

content_descriptors.notes: There is simulated shooting and killing of other players and animals. Minimal blood and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3800X 8-core or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 16GB / AMD RX 6800 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection for multiplayer. Servers are player hosted.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 10900K / AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 16-core
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4090 24GB / AMD RX 7900 XTX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection for multiplayer. Servers are player hosted.

short_description: Single or multiplayer open world camping adventure game where you and your friends are offered a remote camping trip. One week turns into several as you suspect your guide is never coming back. Deserted, you discover you are trapped in an experiment to see if you can survive.
